title: Venetian Hotel - Zeffirino
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Italian, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Traditional Italian restaurant with a few seitan and tofu entrees like tofu sprout salad, seitan marsala, and tofu filet. Romantic atmosphere overlooking the canal in the Venetian/Palazzo. Warning: reported serving foie gras.
